    The difference in cost between two buckets.
  • const uint32 RANGE_OF_COSTS_IN_HEAP

Detailed Description

A class describing the BucketHeap ADT.

It is a heap used by Dijkstra's algorithm in RouteModule.

Removes the RoutingNode with the minimum cost from the heap.

If heap is empty, NULL is returned.

void BucketHeap::reset (   )  [inline]
 

Restores the heap back to its original state.

If overflow has occurred in any bucket, the overflow lists are cleared. The array of the number of used elements and all other integer member variables are set to zero.
